text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long int n ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long int i , k = 0 , x = 0 ; long int a [ 100000 ] = { 0 } ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) k ++ ; else k = 0 ; if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) x = x + k ; } printf ( "%d\n" , x + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
